description: This file defines the interface IAppManager within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. The interface includes nested notification event handlers and methods for managing applications such as launching, loading, terminating, and querying app properties, as well as setting app-related configurations.

classes.name: IAppManager
classes.description: An interface for managing applications, including event notifications and control operations such as launch, stop, and property management.

nested_classes.name: INotification
nested_classes.description: A nested interface for receiving app lifecycle events such as installation, uninstallation, state changes, and launch requests.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification handler to receive app events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification handler.

methods.name: GetLaunchableApps
methods.description: Retrieves an iterator over launchable applications.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Retrieves an iterator over currently loaded applications.

methods.name: LaunchApp
methods.description: Launches an application with specified intent and arguments.

methods.name: LoadApp
methods.description: Loads an application with specified intent and arguments.

methods.name: PrepareApp
methods.description: Prepares an application for launch.

methods.name: SendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message to a specified app.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Closes a specified app.

methods.name: TerminateApp
methods.description: Terminates a specified app.

methods.name: ClearAppData
methods.description: Clears data associated with a specified app.

methods.name: SetAppFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to a specified app.

methods.name: GetAppMetaData
methods.description: Retrieves metadata associated with an app.

methods.name: GetAppProperty
methods.description: Retrieves a property value for an app.

methods.name: SetAppProperty
methods.description: Sets a property value for an app.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of inactive apps allowed.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum number of inactive apps allowed.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Sets the maximum flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Sets the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
